summary: This mod ads a basement to Breezehome connected via stairs instead of a trapdoor like most mods.
descriptionHtml:
============

[b]A new version of this mod is avaliable [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21247]here[/url].[/b]

============

This was a mod requested by my fans to make a basement for Breezehome that used stairs instead of a trapdoor. Check out the video and give me some feedback. Also you can find more details listed below.

[youtube]H0Q7moqx_rY[/youtube]

An addition to Breezehome that includes a basement that is reached by using stairs instead of a portal (door or trapdoor etc.). The basement includes various furniture and
and storage items such as:

enchantment table w/ enchanter\'s satchel to store gems
6 weapon plaques
1 shield plaque
1 weapon rack (3 spots)
2 mannequins
2 player chests
2 strong boxes
noble wardrobe
3 bookshelves (10 books on each of the 3 shelves)

and various other furniture and clutter to decorate the room. You do not have to purchase any additions to get the basement. I didn\'t include them in the house upgrades to 
help eliminate any issues people might have. It is just easier for everyone to avoid that.

Be sure to check out my website and subscribe to me on YouTube for more!

Website - [url=http://www.demorus.com]www.demorus.com[/url]
YouTube - [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/demothekeysmasher]DemoTheKeySmasher[/url]
Twitter - [url=http://www.twitter.com/demotks]DemoTKS[/url]

Hope you enjoy!
author: Demorus
